member.name: T:BayesServer.Statistics.Entropy
member.summary: Calculates entropy, joint entropy or conditional entropy, which can be used to determine the uncertainty in the states of a discrete distribution.
member.remarks: A higher values indicates less certainty about being in a particular state.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.Entropy.Calculate(BayesServer.IDistribution,BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Measures the uncertainty of a distribution.
member.param: The marginal or joint distribution.
The logarithm base to use for the calculations.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.Entropy.Calculate(BayesServer.IDistribution,System.Collections.Generic.IList{BayesServer.VariableContext},BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Measures the uncertainty of a distribution conditional on one or more variables.
member.param: The marginal or joint distribution.
Any conditional variables. I.e. those on the right hand side of H(Y|X) when calculating conditional entropy.
The logarithm base to use for the calculations.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.Entropy.Calculate(BayesServer.Table,System.Collections.Generic.IList{BayesServer.VariableContext},BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Measures the uncertainty of a distribution conditional on one or more variables.
member.param: The marginal or joint distribution.
Any conditional variables. I.e. those on the right hand side of H(Y|X) when calculating conditional entropy.
The logarithm base to use for the calculations.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.Entropy.Calculate(BayesServer.Table,BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Measures the uncertainty of a distribution.
member.param: The marginal or joint distribution.
The logarithm base to use for the calculations.

member.summary: Measures the uncertainty of a distribution.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Statistics.JensenShannon
member.summary: Methods for computing the Jensen Shannon divergence, which measures the similarity between probability distributions.
member.remarks: The Jensen Shannon divergence is symmetric and finite. The square root is a metric.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.JensenShannon.Divergence(BayesServer.IDistribution,BayesServer.IDistribution,BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Calculates the Jensen Shannon divergence between two distributions.
member.param: The first distribution.
The second distribution.
The logarithm base to use in the calculations.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Statistics.KullbackLeibler
member.summary: Calculate the Kullbackâ€“Leibler divergence between 2 distributions with the same variables, D(P||Q).
member.remarks: A value of 0 indicates that the two distributions behave in a very similar or identical way.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.KullbackLeibler.Divergence(BayesServer.IDistribution,BayesServer.IDistribution,BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Calculates the Kullback-Leibler divergence D(P||Q). Supports multivariate distributions. Supports discrete or continuous distributions.
member.param: The distribution Q in D(P||Q), e.g. the Prior.
The distribution P in D(P||Q), e.g. the Posterior.
The base of the computation.
member.returns: The Kullback-Leibler divergence in NATS if the logarithm is natural, BITS if the logarithm is base 2.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase
member.summary: Determines the base of the logarithm to use during calculations such as mutual information.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Statistics.MutualInformation
member.summary: Calculates mutual information or conditional mutual information, which measures the dependence between two variables.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.MutualInformation.Calculate(BayesServer.IDistribution,BayesServer.VariableContext,BayesServer.VariableContext,BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Measures the dependence between two variables.
member.param: The joint distribution over two (head) variables.
X in the expression I(X,Y).
Y in the expression I(X,Y).
The logarithm base to use for the calculations.

member.name: M:BayesServer.Statistics.MutualInformation.Calculate(BayesServer.IDistribution,BayesServer.VariableContext,BayesServer.VariableContext,System.Collections.Generic.IList{BayesServer.VariableContext},BayesServer.Statistics.LogarithmBase)
member.summary: Calculates mutual information or conditional mutual information, which measures the dependence between two variables.
member.param: The joint distribution over two or more variables.
X in the expression I(X,Y) or I(X,Y|Z).
Y in the expression I(X,Y) or I(X,Y|Z).
Any conditional variables. I.e. Z in the expression I(X,Y|Z) when calculating conditional mutual information.
The logarithm base to use for the calculations.

member.summary: Calculates mutual information or conditional mutual information, which measures the dependence between two variables.
member.param: The joint distribution over two or more variables.
X in the expression I(X,Y) or I(X,Y|Z).
Y in the expression I(X,Y) or I(X,Y|Z).
Any conditional variables. I.e. Z in the expression I(X,Y|Z) when calculating conditional mutual information.
The logarithm base to use for the calculations.

member.name: T:BayesServer.Statistics.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: Contains interfaces and classes for performing statistical/probabilistic tests.
